snippet.title: Spacelords - Dr. Kuzmann Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
RAIDERS OF THE BROKEN PLANET is now SPACELORDS!
https://spacelordsthegame.com/news/raiders-of-the-broken-planet-reborns-as-spacelords

---

Once upon a time he was a genius, a brilliant mind and an impressive scientist. Now, little remains of that promising geneticist, and a demented, lunatic, deranged person has taken his place. Long story short, he’s a fucking madman. Dr. Kuzmann is the epitome of the Fifth Council’s scientific division. His limited sanity is focused on torturing and experimenting on his enemies in the most twisted, unimaginable ways.

Dr. Kuzmann, the infamous villain the Raiders faced on the “In Shock” mission is now joining their ranks! Dr. Kuzmann is now available as a playable character for Founders Pack owners. 

---

Learn more about Spacelords: https://spacelordsthegame.com/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/mercurysteam
